title: Distance moved by cart in time t

content.question: The cart of mass <math alttext="M" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mi>M</mi></mrow></math> starts at rest. The reading on the force sensor is <math alttext="F" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mi>F</mi></mrow></math>. Which of the following is a correct expression for the distance that the cart moved in time <math alttext="t" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mi>t</mi></mrow></math> ?

choices.label: <math alttext="the fraction M t over f" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mi>M</mi><mi>t</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>F</mi></mrow></mfrac></mrow></math>
<math alttext="the fraction F t over M" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mi>F</mi><mi>t</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>M</mi></mrow></mfrac></mrow></math>
<math alttext="the fraction F t over 2 M" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mi>F</mi><mi>t</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>M</mi></mrow></mfrac></mrow></math>

<math alttext="the fraction F t squared over 2 M" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mi>F</mi><msup><mrow><mi>t</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>M</mi></mrow></mfrac></mrow></math>

<math alttext="the fraction M t squared over 2 F" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mi>M</mi><msup><mrow><mi>t</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>F</mi></mrow></mfrac></mrow></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="the fraction F t squared over 2 M" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mi>F</mi><msup><mrow><mi>t</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>M</mi></mrow></mfrac></mrow></math>

skill.text: 2.A: Derive a symbolic expression from known quantities by selecting and following a logical mathematical pathway.
